channel.title: Peak on ossem: a creative space
channel.description: Recent content in Peak on ossem: a creative space

item.title: Peak
item.description: troubled waters float this raft from so long ago sweetened stars from above dance merrily below her eyes, so beautiful so glowing mean everything to me I reach for her countenance to help balance these unbalanced mountains in my mind where she believed and others beamed so callously behind that smile that smile wondrous flare and charming aware can only make me believe I believe in her I believe in us
